sentences.text: It is attached to this report.
>  It is attached to this report.
Your translation uses the old template from unstable (only 12t).

Please use
the attached one (in which there are 17 strings).
Note: I already added the translation, but I will wait for the complete one.
"Imagination is more important than knowledge" A.Einstein
# Copyright (C) YEAR THE PACKAGE'S COPYRIGHT HOLDER
# This file is distributed under the same license as the PACKAGE package.
msgid "Configure and start a PPPoE connection"

"All network interfaces have been probed, but a PPPoE concentrator was not "
"detected."

It can be attempted again by "
"selecting the relevant menu entry."
msgid "Please enter the username for the PPP connection."

"This information should have been provided to you by your Internet Service "
"Provider."
msgid "Please enter the password for the PPP connection."

"PPPoE networking cannot be configured because no Ethernet interface was "
"detected."

"A PPPoE connection was attempted, but the provided login information was "
"incorrect.
Because of this the authentication failed."
msgid "Please make sure you type the correct username and password."

"It seems that the attempt to create a connection resulted in an unhandled "
"error.

Probably there is some exceptional situation which prevents "
"establishing the connection."
El lunes, 22 de enero de 2007 a las 15:33:12 +0200, Eddy Petri??

Please use
